description: Performance regression thresholds for CI checks

fps.description: Frames per second - lower values indicate performance degradation

frameTime.description: Frame time in milliseconds - higher values indicate slower rendering

meshingTime.description: Average meshing time per chunk in milliseconds

notes.regressionPercent: Maximum allowed percentage increase/decrease from baseline
notes.failFast: CI will fail if any threshold is exceeded
notes.warningOnly: Set PERF_WARNING_ONLY=true to only warn instead of failing
